answers.answer: I ate two boxes of zebra cakes and two boxes of chocolate covered ice cream cones the three days before my glucose test and it came back normal. Just don't eat any sugar before the appointment. My friend had chocolate cake before her appointment and she had to do the three hr test.

It looks like all your cravings are fruit related. Maybe you can eat some actual fruit to help satisfy that craving? I know for me stuff like jolly ranchers and jelly beans are big for me. So I try and eat sliced apples with a fruit dip, or oranges or buy the fruit cups to try and help. Hope this helps good luck!

All I craved throughout my entire pregnancy was sweets, and I ate them as I wanted them. I found that eating fruit helped with the craving, and I ate cakes, cookies, pies, etc. occasionally and I have a very healthy baby.

question: Lately I've been craving so much candy like fruit gushers, sour patch ect . Is this bad for my baby? Also I have blood test coming up for diabetes ect I think I'm getting myself in trouble lol :(
title: sweet tooth, is it time to stop? ugh
